channel.title: New UA Fey Races Pages
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "New UA Fey Races Pages"

item.title: Re: New UA Fey Races Pages
item.content:encoded: Finished up all the editing on the new UA race pages, and added Hobgoblin of the Feywild to the Hobgoblin page.

item.title: Re: New UA Fey Races Pages
item.content:encoded:
Aw darn, I was just making those pages

Uh here, i guess are the links for all of them i was working on, if you wanna see them or something

http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/fairy
http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/hobgoblin-feywild
http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/owlfolk

I formatted them a little bit differently to you, but i didnt have UA in the link

item.title: Re: New UA Fey Races Pages
item.content:encoded:
Added to the main page.

I would go ahead and add it to the hobgoblin page, we've got other UA versions on the respective race pages so it'll work.

item.title: New UA Fey Races Pages
item.content:encoded:
Here are the pages I made for the new UA Feywild races. I know I can't post them to the main page, so I thought I'll stick them here so others could.

http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/fairy-ua
http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/owlfolk-ua
http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/rabbitfolk-ua

I wasn't sure what to do with the Hobgoblin of the Feywild race, since I didn't if I should make a new page for it or just add it to the Hobgoblin page so that one has yet to be done.

(There are also a few edits to be made with the new pages, such as adding links to spells, but I'll do those as soon as I can.)
